snippet.title: Chromarena Official Trailer
snippet.description:
The official trailer for Chromarena

Chromarena is a 2D top-down twin-stick arena shooter. Combine offense and defense to tear through hordes of color-coded enemies to unlock new guns and set high scores. Form short and medium-term plans, dodge attacks with fully responsive controls, and get into a flow state.

Chromarena Steam page: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1832260/Chromarena/

My discord: https://discord.com/invite/6byZWdwRcW
My email: jack@kingsnakegames.com
